1.title: The Virgin Gary
1.plot: After the Legends defeated Mallus and wiped the final anachronism from time they find themselves in unfamiliar territory with the Time Bureau. All that changes when Constantine informs Sara of a new magical threat that leads the team to Woodstock. Constantine thinks he knows how to defeat the new threat but will need the help of the team and their special klepto talents to help with his spell. Meanwhile, Nate and Rory go on an adventure leaving Nate facing someone from his past.

2.title: Witch Hunt
2.plot: When the magical Time Seismograph goes off, the team finds themselves headed to the Salem witch trials. Sara notices that Zari is taking the case personally when she promises to save a mom, who is being accused of being a witch. However, the team quickly learns that there is a magical creature in the town creating problems they hadn't been expecting. Meanwhile, Nate and Ava work together to try to keep their Time Bureau funding by proving to them that magic exists.

3.title: Dancing Queen
3.plot: When the Legends discover a fugitive is hiding in 1970's London, they realize he is part of a gang that is targeting the British Monarchy. Trying to stop the gang, they realize someone from the Legends must infiltrate them. Surprising everyone, Ray is the one to gain their trust after he is put through a series of tests with help from Sara and Rory. Meanwhile, Gary shows Nate the ropes at the Time Bureau, but it turns out to be anything other than an ordinary day at the office.

4.title: Wet Hot American Bummer
4.plot: When the Legends discover that kids at a summer camp have disappeared, Sara, Ava, Ray and Constantine find themselves as the new camp counselors.

5.title: Tagumo Attacks!!!
5.plot: A new fugitive is loose in 1951 Tokyo; as Constantine struggles to recover, Ray must look outside the team for help; Ava joins Nate and his family for an unconventional Thanksgiving dinner.

6.title: Tender Is the Nate
6.plot: Hank Heywood confronts Ava about the spending habits of the Legends; Mona tries to make a good impression with Ava, but her eagerness gets her and Ava stuck in a cell together.

7.title: Hell No, Dolly!
7.plot: With Rory and Ava at odds, Sara tries to come up with a way for them to get along, but all is put on hold when a new magical creature attacks the Legends. Constantine is forced to confront his tragic past but it could have devastating consequences for the rest of the team. Meanwhile, Mona has a crush on someone she works with and gets some advice from Nate.

8.title: Legends of To-Meow-Meow
8.plot: After Constantine breaks the cardinal rule, he, Charlie and Zari try to deal with the ramifications without telling anyone else.

9.title: Lucha de Apuestas

1.title: Pilot, Part 1
1.plot: Time-traveling rogue, Rip Hunter, has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.

2.title: Pilot, Part 2
2.plot: The team meet Vandal Savage, who senses the presence of Hawkman and Hawkgirl. A fight follows in which Ray loses a piece of his costume that threatens to change the future. Then the team plan to correct that.

3.title: Blood Ties
3.plot: In an effort to weaken Savage by going after his financial assets, Rip and Sara infiltrate his bank. Meanwhile, Snart and Rory take the jump ship back to Central City for a job.

4.title: White Knights
4.plot: Dr. Stein sneaks into a lab and finds out that Savage is trying to create Firestorm.

5.title: Fail-Safe
5.plot: After some of the Legends are captured and thrown into a Russian gulag during the height of the Cold War of 1986, Snart leads the team in an elaborate Prison Break to free their comrades. However, Rip gives Sara a secret side mission that could prove not only to be a liability, but fatal to the team.

6.title: Star City 2046
6.plot: A malfunction sends the Waverider to 2046 Star City where the team faces a future in which they fail to stop Savage and return home.

7.title: Marooned
7.plot: When there's no trace of Savage, Rip spends time dwelling on the past and Rory continues to be a liability to the team. The crew receive a distress call from another Time Master and seek it out, only to find that the ship was commandeered by time pirates. Snart has an important decision to make.

8.title: Night of the Hawk
8.plot: The team tracks Savage to a small town in Oregon in the 1950s where they suspect he's involved in a recent string of murders.

9.title: Left Behind
9.plot: Ray, Sara and Kendra are stranded in the '50s when the Waverider takes off without them.

10.title: Progeny
10.plot: The team is divided over killing a 14-year-old boy who will grow to be a powerful ally for Savage.

11.title: The Magnificent Eight
11.plot: The Legends travel back to the Old Wild West and gain the aid of a true legend - a morally ambiguous gunslinger with a penchant for danger named Jonah Hex.

12.title: Last Refuge
12.plot: A deadly assassin called the Pilgrim wants to wipe the Legends from the timeline by killing the heroes' younger selves before they become powerful.

13.title: Leviathan
13.plot: Rip takes the team to London in the year 2166, three days before his family is killed. He believes this to be their final opportunity to take out Savage who is, unfortunately, at the height of his power. However, the team discovers two key elements to defeating him - Savage's daughter and the means to kill Savage once and for all.

14.title: River of Time
14.plot: After numerous attempts in many different time periods, the team has successfully captured Vandal Savage. However, Savage tells Kendra that he can reunite her with Carter so she struggles with whether she should kill him. Rip decides they will deliver Savage to the Time Masters which doesn't sit well with Snart and Rory. The duo decides it may be time to jump ship and return to their old life. Meanwhile, Savage taunts Ray about his place in Kendra's life.

15.title: Destiny
15.plot: Being in the vicinity of the Time Masters leaves Rip and Rory incredibly disturbed for very different reasons. Meanwhile, Sara takes over the Waverider, Kendra is reunited with Carter and Snart decides he might be a hero after all.

16.title: Legendary
16.plot: After the numerous sacrifices the team has made since the beginning of this ride, Rip decides that it's time they each decide their own destiny and returns them to Central City a few months after they first left. Returned to their normal lives, each team member must individually decide if they are willing to sacrifice everything in order to save the world. Meanwhile, Sara visits with her father who delivers some heartbreaking news about her sister.

1.title: Out of Time
1.plot: When a new threat emerges, Dr. Nate Heywood seeks out Oliver Queen to help find the scattered Legends; once reunited, they go to 1942, to keep Albert Einstein from being kidnapped before the Nazis destroy New York City with a nuclear bomb.

2.title: The Justice Society of America
2.plot: The Legends discover a time aberration that threatens the Justice Society of America, who are on a mission to intercept and seize a mysterious package in Nazi-occupied Paris.

3.title: Shogun
3.plot: Nate is shocked to learn he has powers, but then accidentally lands himself and Ray in Feudal Japan.

4.title: Abominations
4.plot: The Legends find themselves fighting for survival against Confederate zombies in the Civil War.

5.title: Compromised
5.plot: The Legends trace a time quake to the White House during Ronald Reagan's presidency and discover that Damien Darhk is a Senior Adviser.

6.title: Outlaw Country
6.plot: The Legends find Jonah Hex in trouble with his arch-nemesis Quentin Turnbull when they arrive in the Old West.

7.title: Invasion!
7.plot: The Legends work with The Flash, Supergirl and Green Arrow to kill the invaders; while working out how to defeat the Dominators, Stein gets distracted by the aberration he created in 1987.

8.title: The Chicago Way
8.plot: The Legends track a Time Aberration to 1927 Chicago and realize they've been set up by Eobard Thawne, Damien Dahrk and the newest member of the Legion of Doom - Malcolm Merlyn.

9.title: Raiders of the Lost Art
9.plot: Damien Dahrk and Malcolm Merlyn create a big aberration as they attempt to capture Rip in 1967.

10.title: The Legion of Doom
10.plot: The Legends must find the Spear of Destiny before they can rescue Rip, while Malcolm and Damien realize that Thawne is pitting them against each other.

11.title: Turncoat
11.plot: The Legends travel to the winter of 1776 to protect George Washington during the American Revolution, but Sara is forced to send out Nate and Amaya when things don't go as planned.

12.title: Camelot/3000
12.plot: The Legends continue their quest to find the Spear of Destiny before the Legion of Doom get their hands on the pieces. Their first stop is the future, after which they travel to Camelot and find Stargirl guarding a piece of the Spear.

13.title: Land of the Lost
13.plot: The Legends are left seventy million years in the past when Rip causes the Waverider to crash after his capture.

14.title: Moonshot
14.plot: The Legends learn where the last fragment of the Spear of Destiny is hidden when they track Commander Steel to NASA Headquarters in 1970.

15.title: Fellowship of the Spear
15.plot: The Legends land in France during World War I and enlist the aid of J.R.R. Tolkien to retrieve the last pieces of the Spear of Destiny from the Legion of Doom.

16.title: Doomworld
16.plot: The Legion of Doom rewrites history after obtaining the Spear of Destiny, potentially changing the Legends forever.

17.title: Aruba
17.plot: When a massive timequake rocks the ship while the legends are preparing for their next destination, they must break a cardinal rule of time travel.

1.title: Aruba-Con
1.plot: When the Time Bureau relieves the Legends of duty, they must steal back the Waverider when Julius Caesar is spotted in Aruba.

2.title: Freakshow
2.plot: The Legends attempt to fix the anachronism in 1870 that happens to be P.T. Barnum's circus.

3.title: Zari
3.plot: The Legends try to protect an outlaw named Zari in order to capture a rogue time traveler.

4.title: Phone Home
4.plot: The Legends go back to 1988 to save Ray when they realize he'll die because of their breaking time.

5.title: Return of the Mack
5.plot: The Legends run into Rip in 1897 London where they attempt to hunt down a time-traveling vampire.

6.title: Helen Hunt
6.plot: The Legends track down an anachronism in 1930s Hollywood, where Helen of Troy has started a war between two film studios.

7.title: Welcome to the Jungle
7.plot: The team trace a new Anachronism to the jungles of Vietnam. Rory and Nate bump into someone from Rory's past.

8.title: Crisis on Earth-X, Part 4
8.plot: The gang comes together for Barry and Iris's wedding, but the ceremony is crashed by villains from Earth-X.

9.title: Beebo the God of War
9.plot: The Legends investigate an Anachronism in a Viking settlement in the New World and realize the Norsemen are worshiping an artifact as their god.

10.title: Daddy Darhkest
10.plot: John Constantine pays the Legends a visit; they agree to accompany him to a present-day psychiatric hospital and are surprised to discover who Constantine is trying to help; Amaya and Nate once again come face-to-face with Kuasa.

11.title: Here I Go Again
11.plot: Zari finds her place on the team when she gets caught in a time loop that results in the Waverider blowing up over and over again.

12.title: The Curse of the Earth Totem
12.plot: While Sara takes some private time, the Legends follow a lead on the whereabouts of the Earth Totem and find themselves in 1717 on the hunt for Blackbeard's treasure.

13.title: No Country for Old Dads
13.plot: After being taken hostage by the Dahrks, Ray teams with Nora to fix the Fire totem in 1960's East Germany and come face-to-face with a younger and deadlier version of Damien.

14.title: Amazing Grace
14.plot: The Legends embark on a mission to save music when they learn that a tragedy destroyed Memphis in 1954.

15.title: Necromancing the Stone
15.plot: When Mallus' power over Sara resurfaces, she unwittingly becomes the bearer of one of the Totems. Rory must conquer his dark side in order to wield his own Totem power to help save the crew. Meanwhile, Agent Sharpe notices that something is wrong and recruits someone unorthodox to help.

16.title: I, Ava
16.plot: Sara and Ray set out to find Ava when she disappears and Time Bureau agent Gary reveals a disturbing truth about her.

17.title: Guest Starring John Noble
17.plot: The Legends must fix two anachronisms at the same time to keep Mallus at bay and form an uneasy alliance with one of their enemies.

18.title: The Good, the Bad and the Cuddly
18.plot: Rip is forced to improvise when the Legends' plan to vanquish Mallus with the totems doesn't work.

locations: 200-8035 Glenwood Drive, Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada
Canadian Motion Picture Park 8035 Glenwood Dr Burnaby, British Columbia, Canada::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: When heroes alone are not enough - the world needs legends. Having seen the future, Rip Hunter will desperately try to prevent certain events from happening, by time-traveling; Now Rip Hunter is tasked with assembling a desperate group of heroes and villains to confront an unstoppable threat - not only is the planet at stake, but our time line itself. The Great Question being asked here is can this ragtag team defeat an immortal threat unlike anything they have ever known?
imdb.title: Legends of Tomorrow

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post
Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: Time-travelling rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.

When heroes alone are not enough - the world needs legends. Having seen the future, Rip Hunter will desperately try to prevent certain events from happening, by time-traveling; Now Rip Hunter is tasked with assembling a desperate group of heroes and villains to confront an unstoppable threat - not only is the planet at stake, but our time line itself. The Great Question being asked here is can this ragtag team defeat an immortal threat unlike anything they have ever known?

When heroes alone are not enough - the world needs legends. Having seen the future, one he will desperately try to prevent from happening, time-traveling rogue Rip Hunter is tasked with assembling a disparate group of both heroes and villains to confront an unstoppable threat - one in which not only is the planet at stake, but all of time itself. Can this ragtag team defeat an immortal threat unlike anything they have ever known?::ahmetkozan
synopsis: Rip Hunter travels back in time to the present day where he brings together a team of heroes and villains in an attempt to prevent Vandal Savage from destroying the world and time itself.
